title: Top U.S. health officials say they intend to offer other nations tech that might be used against Covid. - The New York Times
content: Top U.S. health officials say they intend to offer other nations tech that might be used against Covid.  The New York Times
description: Dr. Fauci would not be specific about which technologies will be included and could not say if Moderna’s powerful coronavirus vaccine — developed in partnership with N.I.H. scientists — would be among them, he said.
